text:
PicCollage | Taipei Taiwan, VISA, ONSITE

Android and Rails developers, INTERNS welcomed

• About PicCollage

Hello! We are PicCollage from Silicon Valley,

a top 10 photo app for iOS & Android with over 100 million downloads.

Do you want to build something that is used by millions of users around the world?

Do you love to learn, hack and build awesome stuff?

Join our team to build PicCollage and make the world more fun and creative!

Check out our Taipei HQ in 1 min: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=No6V1zFJE8k

• We are NOW looking for...

- Ruby on Rails developer (Server developer)

- Android developer

• We need someone who…

1. Is fluent in English

2. Has good communication skills and loves to share ideas

3. Has logical thinking and patience with trivial tasks

4. Has hunger to learn new skills, curiosity for new things, and passion.

• Apply here: http://cardinalblue.com/dev

• Contact us: jobs@cardinalblue.com
